nodes.text: The Citadel Guardsmen were a group of security agents, who served the Galactic Empire and were based in the Citadel Inquisitorius on Prakith.

The Guardsmen wore red-and-black colored stormtrooper armor, making them similar in appearance to the more elite Citadel Watchmen. However, they were only used for basic security in the citadel. When a group of Alderaanian Resistance agents infiltrated the Citadel, they encountered some Citadel Guardsmen.
